text: When you do things right, people won't be sure you've done anything at all.
A day without laughter is a day wasted.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
Friendship is all the words you can say in the silence.
You need never unsay anything that you did not say in the first place.
One is searching for novelty and nostalgia. One yearns for something new to intrigue and delight, yet one also aches for the faded memories of the past to be reignited and rekindled.
